Text: Helmer2, you clueless little maggot.  What would it change if Einstein never existed, but we had the teaching's, the theories.  Would it matter if they were written by a fiction author?   A million monkeys?  Go keep wasting your life on idiocy, but don't waste ours.  Pitiful.

@UnviolentPeacemaker

You're a stupid nigger. And I should know.
